pythonProjects.text: Flask application to check cafes near you. Users can register to add and review cafes, while admins can edit and delete them. Can take up to some minutes to load the first time.
Flask application to keep to-do lists. Users must register to use it, then they can add, check or delete any number of list and items. Can take up to some minutes to load the first time.
Flask application to extract most used colors from an image. Can take up to some minutes to load the first time.
Bot developed with PyAutoGUI to auto-play google dinosaur game.
Script for web scraping from Booking.com and Airbnb.it. Running it will send a mail with data from the websites results as defined in the script.
Breakout game from Atari, built with the Turtle package and OOP.
GUI app to convert a text file (.txt, .pdf or .doc) into a .mp3 file and vice-versa, using Google service packages.
GUI app to force fast writing: if no input is given in 5 seconds, all text is deleted. It's possible to save results and switch between light and dark mode.
GUI app to test typing speed. Keeps track of user's high score.
GUI app to watermark photos, adding another photo or text from input as a logo.
Script to automatically solve sudoku using a backtracking algorithm. The scheme is given from the user.
Script to play the Connect 4 game (forza 4 in italian) on terminal, as text. 2 players required.
Script to play Tic Tac Toe on terminal, as text. 2 players required.

jsProjects.text: This website. It was originally built with only HTML and CSS, and later translated to React.
Quiz app built with Node, Express and EJS. Questions are fetched from a quiz API. Can take up to some minutes to load the first time.
